user_query: I'm planning a vacation and I want to know the credit scores of hotels in different cities. Can you fetch the credit scores for hotels in New York, London, and Paris? Also, provide me with the latest prices of gold, silver, and platinum in euros. Lastly, calculate the VAT-compliant price for a hotel stay costing 500 euros in each city.

TaskList.description: Fetch credit scores for hotels in New York.
Fetch credit scores for hotels in London.
Fetch credit scores for hotels in Paris.
Retrieve the latest prices of gold in euros.
Retrieve the latest prices of silver in euros.
Retrieve the latest prices of platinum in euros.
Calculate the VAT-compliant price for a hotel stay of 500 euros in New York.
Calculate the VAT-compliant price for a hotel stay of 500 euros in London.
Calculate the VAT-compliant price for a hotel stay of 500 euros in Paris.
